text: Philippe Clair (14 September 1930 – 28 November 2020) was a Moroccan-born French actor, director, producer, screenwriter, and comedian.Philippe Clair at Unifrance Films He was born in Ahfir, Morocco. His career lasted from 1950 to 2013. He was known for starring in the 1962 comedy Girl on the Road. He also directed, produced and wrote the comedies Déclic et des claques (1965) and Par où t'es rentré ? On t'a pas vu sortir (1984). Clair died on 28 November 2020 at the age of 90.Philippe Clair, réalisateur culte de comédies franchouillardes, nous a quittés ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1930 births Category:2020 deaths Category:French movie directors Category:French screenwriters Category:French movie producers Category:French comedians Category:French movie actors Category:French television actors Category:French stage actors Category:Moroccan writers Category:Moroccan actors
title: Philippe Clair
